name: ArenaMania
description:
“It’s the best game I’ve ever played” - The Developer
“Whatever you like sweetie” - The Developer's Mom
“Instead of making this, you could do some real work!” - The Developer's Dad


ArenaMania is a horde killing action game, where you beat levels by surviving for a given time in 40 different levels. Loot, blow up your enemies and most of all: Run!


Features:

- 13 diffrent spell that randomly upgrades from level to level, because there was no more idea for a 14th spell.



- 40 different level, because we couldn’t just stop at 39.



- 4 boss battles, ergo not 3.



- Exploding crowd, because why not!
